reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced good accomodation for my visiting friends (I was living in Shanghai). Actually after I read reviews of the hotel here in TripAdvisor I decided to book this hotel.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel
Good value for small money
reviews.text: I'm happy with that decision. The room is very nice, very clean, and everything works fine. The location is great too since it's near Xujiahui. It's near a subway station too. If anything, since the hotel is in an exhibition complex, the lobby is always very busy, too busy. But once you get upstairs to your room, it's all quiet. Basically my friends were really happy with the hotel.
THe price was RMB500 per night, booked via ctrip (highly recommended too).
reviews.title: Clean and convenient.

reviews.text: My rating "above" average is really related to the price. Clean rooms, nice bathroom, all services.
reviews.title: Good Value, annoying messages during the night
